description: Developed by Adobe Systems Incorporated. Approved as ISO 32000-1:2008.  A general document representation language. PDF represents formatted, page-oriented documents. Adobe documentation for version 1.7 is dated November 2006, and associated with Acrobat and Adobe Reader 8.
name: PDF (Portable Document Format), version 1.7, Base level (ISO 32000-1:2008)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">pdf</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
